scripts.build:css:dev: NODE_ENV=development node scripts/build-css.js && postcss static/css/dist/combined.css -o static/css/dist/development.css
scripts.build:css:prod: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/build-css.js && postcss static/css/dist/combined.css -o static/css/dist/production.css
scripts.build:css:watch: npm run build:css:dev && chokidar "static/css/**/*.css" -c "npm run build:css:dev"
scripts.build:tailwind:watch: npm run build:tailwind:dev && chokidar "static/css/tailwind-base.css" "templates/**/*.html" -c "npm run build:tailwind:dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:css:prod && npm run build:tailwind:prod
scripts.precommit: npm run lint:css && npm run format:check
scripts.quality: npm run lint:css && npm run format:check && npm run build:css:prod && npm run build:tailwind:prod
